entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ArrayPoolEventSource.BufferDropped event is not documented at learn.microsoft.com. #96199
  • [browser][MT] MutexTests - operation does not support unaligned accesses #96191
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] deadlock in System.Collections.Concurrent.Tests #96190
    9.0.0
  • Custom InterpolatedStringHandler with a DefaultInterpolatedStringHandler performs worse than one with a StringBuilder when not enabled #96188
  • [NativeAOT] No usable version of libssl was found on linux-bionic-arm64 #96184
  • Memory footprint decreases when application is launched as a console, but does not when launched through a Windows service #96179
  • Why do HttpHeaders.GetValues() throw when header does not exist? #96176
  • [NativeAOT] Method overrides with covariant return type don't work in all cases #96175
  • NativeAOT stackalloc returning garbage in AggressiveInlining method #96174
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] deadlock in BrowserWebSocket when used from multiple threads #96173
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: GFNI Intrinsics #96170
  • Optimize `Vector*<*>.WithElement(variable, variable)` with `vpbroadcast* *mm* {k*}` #96163
    Future
  • Regressions in Benchstone.BenchI.MulMatrix #96194
  • Regressions in Benchstone.BenchI.LogicArray #96195
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 16 Regressions on 12/12/2023 7:40:56 AM #96193
  • [API Proposal]: AVX-512 `VPOPCNTDQ` and `BITALG` Intrinsics #96162
  • [feature-request] Full managed Quic implement #96161
  • Native aot regression in .net 8.0 (Expression tree + ReadOnlySpan) #96160

Closed

  • I'm getting System.MissingMethodException when using netstandard2.0 project from net8.0 #96197
  • failure assigning ulong to decimal #96152
  • [runtime-jit-experimental] Assertion failed 'loops->NumLoops() == 0' #96145
    9.0.0
  • TLS session resumption on Linux clients using client-side certificates #96164
  • [PGO] assert "Mismatch in align instruction." #95755
    9.0.0
  • SqlServer Operations too slow in Ubuntu #96171
  • Remove use of virtual calls in handle table #11532
    Future
  • EventSource improvements for text logging #12730
    Future
  • [Fuzzlyn] Assertion failed '!"Unexpected bbKind"' #96146
    9.0.0
  • DateTime format uses a non standard space character when running in a Docker Linux container #96022
  • Wrong display of ShortDatePattern (en-CA) on Debian 12 (bookworm) #95974

PullRequests

Created

  • Manually optimize a rem 64 instruction to avoid regression on Mono #96203
    area-System.Collections, tenet-performance, runtime-mono, community-contribution
  • superpmi: fix failureLimit #96202
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT ARM64: Add IF_SVE_DT_3A, IF_SVE_DU_3A, IF_SVE_DX_3A, IF_SVE_DY_3A #96201
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Various no-diff cleanups and debugging additions/fixes #96200
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][browser] Fix WASM README path #96198
    area-Build-mono
  • Change regMaskTP to struct with 1 field #96196
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Arm64: reduce switch sizes in emitIns_R_R_R #96192
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Fix ProcessWaitingTests.WaitChain and ProcessWaitingTests.Wa… #96187
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, test-enhancement, community-contribution, arch-riscv, 9.0.0
  • Longer item expiry for debug builds in System.Runtime.Caching.Tests #96186
    area-System.Runtime.Caching, community-contribution
  • Avoid options field allocation in UnnamedOptionsManager #96185
    area-Extensions-Options, community-contribution
  • Propagate localsinit flag from callees #96180
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [WIP][infra] Enable trimming on Helix for Apple mobile #96169
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Use a sorted module order for metadata generation #96168
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Make sorting of modules more stable in the compiler #96167
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Precise reflection-visible delegate target analysis #96166
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix idle HTTP/2 connection KeepAliveTimeout teardown #96158
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.x

Merged

  • JIT: Generalize check for cycles when finding loops #96153
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Change impImportLeave to directly import BBJ_CALLFINALLYRET #96159
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix idle HTTP/2 connection KeepAliveTimeout teardown #96157
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Remove BBF_NONE_QUIRK check in loop alignment #95999
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization use system ICU #93220
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Fix culture-dependent ToString in illink tests #96172
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Add Arm64 encodings for IF_SVE_AR_4A, IF_SVE_AS_4A #96165
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • [wasm] Browser.targets: Fix .dlls being deployed to `publish/` #96045
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] Extract `src/mono/browser` from `src/mono/wasm` #95940
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Add emitUnitTests.sh #96064
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [release/8.0-staging] [browser][fix] maxParallelDownloads #95870
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.2
  • Handle `BBJ_CALLFINALLYRET` block kind when checking for loop exit #96147
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add dumpers for new loop data structures #96080
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • A few optimizations for the gcinfodecoder construction #96150
    tenet-performance, area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix unhandled exception with no managed frames #96138
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [NO MERGE][Mono] ready levels #95927
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-meta-mono
  • [wasm] p/invoke and interop improvements #94446
    area-Build-mono
  • [NativeAOT] Support library mode with NativeAOT on iOS-like platforms #93658
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix crash when processing aliases that do not point at names #96048
    area-System.Text.Json, source-generator
  • Add runtime module address to SpecialDiagInfo block in createdump and fix missing DotNetRuntimeDebugHeader export #96121
    Servicing-consider, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • JIT: remove bound check for negated ranges #96123
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve the hashtable for EEClassHash #94825
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] JSImport dispatch to target thread via JSSynchronizationContext #95370
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser] introduce JSProxyContext #95959
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Change Native AOT ThreadBuffer.m_threadId to OS thread id #96120
    Servicing-consider, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • Console.Unix: fix ANSI colors over redirected standard output. #95654
    area-System.Console, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Fix `CopyStringDictionary` #96093
    area-System.Configuration, community-contribution
  • JIT: ARM64 SVE format encodings, `SVE_IH_3A` to `SVE_JO_3A` #95994
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • [WIP][mono][tests] Enable ILStrip during AOT compilation of library tests #88167
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Fix bug in label printing in disasm #96136
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [NativeAOT] Inline TLS access for windows/x64 #89472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [IGNORE] Gshared mrgctx #96108
    NO-REVIEW
  • [mono][jit] Optimize the experimental-gshared-mrgctx code #96104
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Use Binary Search Tree for Frozen Collections length buckets strategy #94768
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Move to building with the 9.0 SDK and move our ToolCurrent TFM to 9.0 #95980
    area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Adding osx-arm64 Mono Interpreter runtime tests job to extra-platforms #96023
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [RISC-V] Simplify codegen for div/mod #96068
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [android] Bump to win 11 helix queue #96139
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [aot][browser] Stop throwing in CultureInfo getter #95910
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • [release/8.0-staging] [PERF] Update osx.1015 queue to osx.13 queue. #96148
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/7.0-staging] [PERF] Update osx.1015 queue to osx.13 queue. #96149
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Use corresponding exception message, if null passed #90505
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • ObjWriter in C# #95876
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Clarify OS and Arch ownership #95972
    area-Meta
  • Cleanup some string operating functions #96099
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix potential NREs in ConfigurationBindingGenerator #96078
    area-Extensions-Configuration, source-generator
  • Fix JitOptRepeat #94250
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement more APIs in new TypeBuilder, fix bugs found during testing #95753
    area-System.Reflection.Emit

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Wasm components as replacement for lower level, e.g. libc implementations. Such as HTTP/time/random #2468

PullRequests

Merged

  • [NativeAOT LLVM] Enable JS interop #2440
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet.exe silently ignores global.json with a two digit sdk version #37602
  • ISerializable documentation claims it works with XmlSerializer #37601
  • IsPublishable with PublishSingleFile, PublishAot etc. copies unnecessary .pdb to PublishDir #37585

PullRequests

Updated

  • Permit setting whether to use workload sets or loose manifests Fixes #34561 #37346
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • dotnet tool run and install roll-forward option #37231
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #37543
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add automatically tool upgrade and downgrade for different versions for dotnet tool install #37311
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Provide new default for runtime identifier Fixes #35575 #36848
    Area-External, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-19
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Extension lowering #7771
  • [Proposal]: Add `private` and `namespace` accessibility modifiers for top-level types. #6794
    Working Set

PullRequests

Updated

  • Create spec for const expressions for is patterns #7589

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Properties with inaccesible access methods shouldn't be visible #71363
    Backlog
  • Remove IPersistentStorageService, ITemporaryStorageService, ITemporaryTextStorage and ITemporaryStreamStorage. #71361
  • Sort Members in implementng class #71355
  • View Call Heirarchy shows nameof() operator as a reference and as recursive call #71351
  • #endregion name should match #region name, display current region #71344
  • C#: <see cref="FunctionA"/> in regular code comments #71342
  • "Request codeLens/resolve failed" error when using collection expression spread syntax #71339
  • [LSP] Introduce local for all occurrences code action only changes on occurence #71335
  • Natural delegate type depends on order of candidates #71333

Closed

  • [LSP] Remove NFW reporting in `RangeToTextSpan` after issue is fixed #66258
    17.6
  • Create an attribute that will allow us to hide a class from Intellisense #71341
  • Attribute to hide members in IntelliSense in same project or solution #71210
    Backlog
  • IDE0290 Primary Constructor should exclude interop structs #71357
  • C# Text Editor: Add option for conditional expression over 'if' #71354
  • Visual Studio adds using based on wrong assumptions #71353
  • editorconfig csharp_new_line_before_members_in_object_initializers not respecting arrays #71352
  • Option to show suggestions from unimported namespaces but add namespace inline instead of adding a using #71350
  • NAMES SUGGESTION ON TOKEN RENAME INCORRECT CASE #71349
  • save as, like everyone else #71348
  • Suggestions for generic inference #71347
  • Rogue IntelliSense Recommends Emoji-Based Variable Names #71346
  • Visual Studio and VS Code Disable/Enable/Deprecate C# methods #71345
  • Support trim_trailing_whitespace in .editorconfig in Visual Studio 2022 #71343
  • Missing CS4014 when function is not async #71358
  • SynthesizedReadOnlyListTypeSymbol.Create should check for MissingMetadataTypeSymbol for missing types #71297
    17.9

PullRequests

Created

  • Add error logging to RequestContext #71366
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • DRAFT: Add razor diagnostic endpoint #71365
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • WIP. Indenting string builder with generator #71364
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • WIP: Temporary storage #71362
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Move to value-tasks in asset lookup #71360
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add handling of params collections for natural delegate types #71334
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • [Inline Rename] Update the UI related to Copilot #71332
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged

Merged

  • SynthesizedReadOnlyListTypeSymbol.Create - Check for MissingMetadataTypeSymbol #71330
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Fix GetDocumentationComment returns unresolved doc reference for inheritdoc typeparamref #70230
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to release/dev17.9 #71336
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to release/dev17.9 #71274
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Do not compile all types during ENC #71254
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Semantic search #71268
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • API proposal for an IndentingStringBuilder. #71163
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove system for dumping text files into memory mapped files. #70160
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Run integration tests on helix #71328
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use new helper type for initializing a value type field only once, and in a threadsafe manner. #71013
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • IOperation - drop synthesized conversion placed on top of params collections #71325
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Collection expressions: synthesize singleton list type for IEnumerable<T>, IReadOnlyCollection<T>, IReadOnlyList<T> #71147
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Extract compilation-tracker/SG-production code out of SolutionState to a new owner. #71257
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Define a pattern for a component that ensures a data protection keyring has an active key #52916
  • Introduce a read-only mode for data protection keyring consumers #52915
  • How to configure .NET 8 AspNetCore Identity with Active Directory Federation Services (ADFS) as external provider using OpenIdConnect #52913
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #52911
  • Question: Is C# project with multiple secrets.json files (i.e. UserSecretId values) supported? #52909
  • Nullpointer exception in SignalR Java SDK 8.0.0 HubConnection class #52907
  • Logging the reason behind "InvalidToken" response from UserManager.ConfirmEmailAsync method #52906
  • Blazor AOT Publish For Webassembly Hosted Application NET8.0 #52905
  • Call JS checkValidity() from Blazor EditForm - Get ElementReference for EditForm #52902
  • Render Mode Auto Interactive does not wait for next access of a component before swapping to WASM #52899
  • Build Error in Azure Pipeline when Building Blazor Project with MSBuild in Blazor WebAssembly Mode #52898
  • Published size improvement: basicminimalapipublishaot #52894
  • update project templates use primary constructors #52893
  • Full Clipboard Access #52892
  • HTTP2_PROTOCOL_ERR #52891
  • Quarantine Microsoft.AspNetCore.Server.IIS.FunctionalTests.StartupTests.WrongApplicationPath_FailedToRun #52889
  • Invalid html markup string throws unhandled exception in Blazor webassembly and Maui #52888
  • Automate SDK updates #52886
    .NET 9 Planning

Closed

  • We think this is addressed in .NET 8. Closing it for now. #52799
  • Endpoint with wildcard param clashes with route without one causing Open API document not to be generated #52835
  • Question: When using Blazor RenderMode.Server, is there a way to add a loader or spinner #13933
    Planning: WebUI
  • PreventDefault as a method on Blazor event arguments #45949
    Planning: WebUI
  • First class component support for Multi Page Applications #38112
    Planning: WebUI
  • Authentication used on every path even without UseAuthentication() since .NET 8 #52720
  • Debugging: Update dictionary debuggers in aspnetcore to follow the new standard #51827
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, json #52882
  • Application not working when upgrading from RC2 to the final version #52190
  • asp.net core 8 部署到iis上出现了问题 #52539

PullRequests

Created

  • Annotate Http.Connections for trimming #52918
    area-signalr, linker-friendliness
  • [Infrastructure] Move back to NPM #52914
    area-infrastructure
  • Skip failing Libuv test on Alpine #52912
    area-infrastructure, area-networking, 6.0.x
  • Make Identity tests use public API to configure EF. #52910
    area-identity
  • JSInterop: Enable returning null for a nullable value type #52908
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Use ArgumentException.ThrowIfNullOrEmpty and ThrowIfNullOrWhitespace #52897
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Avoid setting incompatible default value for StringValue sources #52895
    feature-rdg, area-networking
  • [Test failure] Quarantine Microsoft.AspNetCore.Server.IIS.FunctionalTests.StartupTests.WrongApplicationPath_FailedToRun #52890
    area-networking

Merged

  • Fix xml comment typo in AspNetCore.Identity.UI.Services.IEmailSender #52887
    area-identity, community-contribution, 9.0-preview1
  • [Templates]Update project template localization files #52896
    area-mvc, 9.0-preview1
  • Improve debug views of dictionaries #52867
    area-networking, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • Fix shadow copy up to date check on startup #52831
    feature-iis, area-networking
  • Populate the ValidIssuer and the ValidAudience properties of the JwtBearerOptions.TokenValidationParameters. #52821
    area-auth, area-identity, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] Add ForgotPasswordRequest to STJ source generation context #52830
    area-identity, community-contribution, 8.0.x
  • [blazor][wasm] Remove legacy interop #52732
    area-blazor, arch-wasm, .NET 9 Planning
  • Fix SSR page rendering intermediate state instead of the end state of components #52823
    area-blazor

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Entry doesn't use the TextColor property when the Text value is bound after some seconds (iOS) #19509
  • App FlowDirection is restricted to device flow direction and doesn't respond to any changes #19506
  • NullPointer from SearchHandlerAppearanceTracker on iOS #19504
    Backlog
  • [UITest] Include information about device requirements when the visual tests fail #19503
    Backlog
  • On ios, if IsReadOnly is true, the Editor will not be able to scroll #19500
    Backlog
  • Setting Shell.FlyoutWidth causes problems on WinUI with changed values in binding context #19496
    Backlog
  • Button with image does not autosize on iOS when text is changed. #19495
  • Expander resizing preventing user swiping to next item in carousel #19490
    Backlog
  • APT0003 and other errors with new template #19489
  • [Testing] Legacy ported UITest RemoveItemsQuickly fails on iOS #19488
    Backlog
  • [Testing] Legacy ported UITest Issue10300Test fails on iOS #19487
    Backlog
  • .NET MAUI project using the PDF.js library - Issue loading the PDF from iOS resource #19486

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix discovering iOS 17 simulators on CI #19501
  • [testing] Enable a way to test on real devices #19492

Merged

  • Fix Clear Button size calculation #19482
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [X] Change the default value for xaml-comp #19390
    area/Xaml </>
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19454
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Housekeeping] Fix main build #19494
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • iOS Keyboard Scrolling Improvements and UITests (not from fork) #17670
    platform/iOS 🍎, partner/cat 😻, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, area/keyboard, Under Consideration
  • [macOS] Fix `GesturePlatformManager.CalculatePosition` when asked for a relative position #19371
    community ✨, area/gestures
  • [X] Warn on non compiled bindings #19360
    area/perf 🏎️
  • [ci] Move to new compliance task #19475
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [iOS] Fix Flyout layout #19125
    area/shell 🐢
  • Bump Xamarin.UITest from 4.1.4 to 4.3.3 #19394
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • Do not use underscores in the ApplicationId #19377
    area/templates 📄
  • Add PostNotifications to Permissions #19472
    area/essentials 🍞
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D8 #18760
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, control-editor
  • Devices.Sensors.Location: rework argument handling in constructors #19459
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • [net8.0] Update with main #19381
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Housekeeping] Added UI Test to validate project template #18567
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, stale
  • [Testing] Add legacy ScrollView UITests #19054
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, layout-scrollview, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • [Testing] Add legacy CollectionView UITests #18979
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/collectionview 📃, area/testing, testing-legacy-ui-tests

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Inefficient Type.GetProperties usage in when compiling/running a query against SqlServer #32649
  • Cosmos tests sometimes run out of internal service providers #32647
  • RelationalTypeMappingSource Leak #32645
  • RelationalTypeMapping | Method not found #32644
  • How to translate a custom method on a type to SQL to improve performance on a JSON column in EF8? #32643
  • How to manage adding/removal of properties to a class mapped to Json column? #32642

Closed

  • Allow overriding scaffolded many-to-many mapping in OnModelCreatingPartial #26555
    9.0.0
  • ForeignKeyAttribute on skip navigations fails to remove by-convention join table from model #27990
    9.0.0
  • SqlQuery<T>() and complex properties #32646

PullRequests

Created

  • Break up KeyDiscoveryConvention #32650
  • Microsoft.Data.Sqlite: Don't assume nullabilty or uniqueness of projected columns #32648
  • Singulaize before checking for CSharp name conflicts #32641

Merged

  • Make ITableMappingBase.IncludesDerivedTypes null if there are no derived types #32628
  • Don't keep join entity type around because a ForeignKeyAttribute used to reference it. Instead, remove it and reattach the configuration. #32640

Updated

  • Allow generated class members to have same name as generated classes when casing differs #32629
  • Additional testing transforming the database model to the IModel that will then be used for scaffolding #32631

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-19
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Installer is failing to synchronize in sourcebuild #17682
  • DownloadFile failing repeatedly on Darwin_Build_Release_x64 despite the file being there #17588

PullRequests

Created

  • Baseline manifest (for 8.0.2xx) #18004
